Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress Parkway/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound #7 buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Pulaski, Jackson, Keeler, and Congress due to police activity near Congress Parkway/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Pulaski, Jackson, Keeler, and Congress due to police activity near Congress Parkway/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
